reviewText:
Missing major component, which makes their decription a lie. No sandbox mode or even a map editor. It has nothing to do with modeling at all.
All you do is pick an engine, pick your freight or a passenger car and go in a cricle from station to station loading/unloading. The only thing you do control is start/stop the train and the switches.

Granted it is only $5, but you are not getting anything for it at all. I played the first two scenarios and maybe the game does get better, but I got bored. Since there is no table view having more than one train is pointless, because you have stop all other trains to be able to concentrate on one.
voteText: 83 of 87 people (95%) found this review helpful 3 people found this review funny

reviewText:
I wholeheartedly do not recommend this game. You buy a loco and cars, drive the train around in circles between stations dropping off and picking up passengers (don't incur a penality!) one ONE screen and THAT IS IT. It's like model railroad used to be. Track/train/power mindless circling of the track.


NO sandbox, NO track laying, NO POINT.  This is a good game for say a five year old but for adults it's insulting.


The game is awful.  Please do not spend your money on it.


Thanks for reading.
